task.role: You are a Senior Rust Engineer with expertise in systems programming and APIs. Implement Task 9 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Create REST API endpoints for task CRUD operations with filtering and soft delete
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Create tasks.rs handler module 2. Implement POST /api/teams/:team_id/tasks - create task 3. Implement GET /api/teams/:team_id/tasks - list tasks with filters (status, assignee, due_date) 4. Implement GET /api/tasks/:id, PATCH /api/tasks/:id, DELETE /api/tasks/:id 5. Add soft delete with deleted_at timestamp and 30-day cleanup job 6. Implement query parameter parsing for filters 7. Add validation for task status enum (todo/in-progress/done)

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-9): Implement task management API endpoints

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Integration tests for CRUD operations, filtering, and soft delete functionality with cleanup verification
